law.text:
The duties of the Agritourism Advisory Council shall include but not be limited to the following:
Review and make recommendations on the development of the statewide master plan, based upon the report from the Office of Agritourism in accordance with KRS 247.802(1); and
Make recommendations to redirect the duties of the Office of Agritourism as necessary, in keeping with the office's purposes stated in KRS 247.800.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2002.
